genes.content:
- **ğŸ”’ Self-Hosting in your VPC or on-prem**: We have full self-hosting guides for AWS, GCP, Kubernetes generally, and docker compose available on our [documentation page here](https://docs.trieve.ai/self-hosting/docker-compose).
- **ğŸ§  Semantic Dense Vector Search**: Integrates with OpenAI or Jina embedding models and [Qdrant](https://qdrant.tech) to provide semantic vector search.
- **ğŸ” Typo Tolerant Full-Text/Neural Search**: Every uploaded chunk is vector'ized with [naver/efficient-splade-VI-BT-large-query](https://huggingface.co/naver/efficient-splade-VI-BT-large-query) for typo tolerant
